title: Ramses II
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 1,343 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 1060L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Q and Z2
description: Born to a military commander and his wife, Ramses II never expected to be crowned pharaoh of ancient Egypt. Readers will be fascinated by his journey to becoming one of the most famous and influential leaders of the time.
